price: . Na wakamuuza kwa thamani duni, kwa akali ya pesa. Wala hawakuwa na haja naye.
arabic: وَشَرَوۡهُ بِثَمَنِۭ بَخۡسٖ دَرَٰهِمَ مَعۡدُودَةٖ وَكَانُواْ فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلزَّٰهِدِينَ
footnotes: Wakamuuza Misri kwa bei ya chini kabisa, si kiasi chake! Thamani yake ilikuwa ni pesa chache tu! Wala hawakuwa wakimtakia Yusuf thamani kubwa, kwa kukhofia wasije watu wake wakamkuta wakamtambua, na wakawapokonya Yusuf.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darāhima maʿdūdatin wakānū fīhi mina al-zāhidīna
